mapper.insert: insert into wlan_eirp (wlan_eirp_id, info_id, wlan_eirp_count, wlan_eirp_ant, wlan_eirp_model, wlan_eirp_rate, wlan_eirp_freq, wlan_eirp_result, wlan_eirp_judgement, wlan_eirp_time, wlan_eirp_delete) values (#{wlanEirpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanEirpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wlanEirpAnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanEirpModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanEirpRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanEirpFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlanEirpResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{wlanEirpJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, #{wlanEirpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{wlanEirpDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update wlan_eirp set info_id = #{infoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_eirp_count = #{wlanEirpCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wlan_eirp_ant = #{wlanEirpAnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_eirp_model = #{wlanEirpModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_eirp_rate = #{wlanEirpRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_eirp_freq = #{wlanEirpFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wlan_eirp_result = #{wlanEirpResult,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, wlan_eirp_judgement = #{wlanEirpJudgement,jdbcType=BIT}, wlan_eirp_time = #{wlanEirpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wlan_eirp_delete = #{wlanEirpDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where wlan_eirp_id = #{wlanEirpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select wlan_eirp_id, info_id, wlan_eirp_count, wlan_eirp_ant, wlan_eirp_model, wlan_eirp_rate, wlan_eirp_freq, wlan_eirp_result, wlan_eirp_judgement, wlan_eirp_time, wlan_eirp_delete from wlan_eirp where wlan_eirp_id = #{wlanEirpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select wlan_eirp_id, info_id, wlan_eirp_count, wlan_eirp_ant, wlan_eirp_model, wlan_eirp_rate, wlan_eirp_freq, wlan_eirp_result, wlan_eirp_judgement, wlan_eirp_time, wlan_eirp_delete from wlan_eirp
